Reviews.Title: Just awesome
Reviews.Author: Jose
Reviews.Content: Paid 150 dollars for my good condition iphone 3g and received it in a few days. The condition made it seemed not even used, it just has like 2 scratches on the screen and they are not even bad. The phone deal is better than I thought, 150 for an out of contract iphone, can't get better than that anywhere. Thank you again amazon!P.S. To answer the questions of the people wondering I'm sure, the phone is not unlocked and you must do it yourself. It is very easy so just look it up online.

Reviews.Title: Shocked, shocked I tell you!
Reviews.Author: Mr James
Reviews.Content: I could not be any happier with this purchase. I bought a used, good condition iphone 3 for about $100. I wasn't worried about the purchase as I knew if the phone was bad Amazon would take it back no questions asked, but it was perfect. It came in the original box with all the accessories, (earbuds, cords, charger, manual, sim tool etc) The cords and buds were brand new, still wrapped in plastic and the phone was as close to new as you can get. Not a scratch on it. I had to charge the battery overnight, as it was completely dead, but after that I ran through the set up process and everything is working perfectly. I synced my gmail, itunes, contacts, calendars, reminders etc and it all went flawlessly. I love this phone. My only problem is now that I know how great iphones are, and that I can get a good deal thru Amazon, I'm already thinking about upgraded to a 4 the generation, or maybe even the 5. Anyway, I'm very happy with this purchase, and if you're looking for a cheap no contract phone, you won't find a better deal.

Reviews.Title: Love the phone
Reviews.Content: The phone is in very good condition.  The screen is perfect, no scratch.  It's a lock phone so I have to have to have it unlock to be able to use it with T-Mobile Sim Card.

Reviews.Title: Changed Everything
Reviews.Author: Damian P. Gadal
Reviews.Content: I never really liked cell phones until I got an iPhone.  To me, they were a painful necessity, that felt more like an electronic leash than a useful tool.This all changed when I got my iPhone 3G.  Here was a tool, that had functional access to the internet, and email.  In addition, there was every kind of app imaginable, from entertainment, weather, photography, social media, you name it.I found myself using my phone more and more, and not to make phone calls.  In fact, being able to use this thing as a phone is just a bonus.I've been extremely happy with my iPhone, and am writing this review on the 3G as sort of a thank you.  The iPhone has become an integral part of my life, just as owning a computer did.After owing this item for 3 happy years, it's time for me to upgrade.  I will miss my 3G, but am sure that the iPhone 4S will more than fill the void.

Reviews.Title: THIS PHONE IS LOCKED
Reviews.Author: vic
Reviews.Content: PLEASE , Don't buy this phone if U are looking for unlocked phone. Is locked and U have to pay to it unlocked

Reviews.Title: Good product
Reviews.Author: Seamus Wilson
Reviews.Content: Its a great product, shipped fast, just a little slow. Other than that it has met the expectations set. TYBG.

Reviews.Title: iphone
Reviews.Author: Laura Sanders
Reviews.Content: It came a day early which was a plus because it was my sons bday present and arrived on his birthday... works and functions great. I ordered black but got white but luckily that's also sons favorite :-)  couldn't ask for a smoother transaction... thank you so much !!!

Reviews.Title: Phone did not work
Reviews.Author: cortnee ponton
Reviews.Content: phone was suppose to be in ''like neW" condition and it doesn't work at all. I could not even activate It. I feel there should be someone that actually Checks these devices before they Can even be listed. The worst part is that it was intended to be a gift.

Reviews.Title: Nothing but problems
Reviews.Author: Jen "Jen"
Reviews.Content: I bought my daughter this phone as a Christmas gift.  Although it did arrive before Christmas it was missing the power button.  I was upset because my daughter could not use this phone, it was described as new and the missing button made me believe otherwise.  Had to pay to have it shipped back for a replacement.  This time the phone quit charging and the where the speaker for you ear is located the mesh screen was pushed up into the phone.  We could never use the phone because it would not charge or turn on for me.  Could not get the phone to work so I paid out of pocket yet again to have it shipped back although I  was not aware until this company informed me that apple discontinued this model and it will not update on the apple website either. So why was it for sale to begin with? They are supposed to refund my purchase price but are now threatening me with a 50 % restocking fee and also accused me of tampering with the phone which I would  not waste my time doing something like that in the first place.  This was not the original agreement we came to in the first place so I am really not sure why I have to pay a penalty for faulty equipment.  I have never experienced such poor customer service through amazon before and I do not recommend spending your hard earned money here.  You may end up as disappointed as I have been with this company, I will never purchase anything through Tronixsquare ever again!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Not good
Reviews.Author: menlla
Reviews.Content: battery pop out a month after I bought this item. could not return because I already mailed it to my brother outside US

Reviews.Title: thank you
Reviews.Author: breyanna
Reviews.Content: Thank you very much I really enjoy the phone and have a bless day and new year and joy yourself

Reviews.Title: Excellent Iphone 3 product
Reviews.Author: not a domestic goddess "DLR"
Reviews.Content: Ordered an iPhone 3 and it works great, my wife has iPhone 4s for work and #3 still has same great features even though an older version. We use it in Germany with WiFi hotspots - to use as a phone will need to unlock it as we live in Germany for the next few years. So older models still have value.

Reviews.Title: Only lasted a week!
Reviews.Author: Chanette
Reviews.Content: The phone looked pretty good but after a week the power button was broken. Also, the iphone was super glued together. It wasn't screwed it was Glued!. I gave it a 2 because of its fast service

Reviews.Title: Bad product
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Product did not work properly, could not get it to turn on. Had to return the product back for refun for credit

Reviews.Title: very bad condition
Reviews.Author: Pen Name
Reviews.Content: I pay $64 for a Iphone 3 this is very horrible duty a lot of stratches no charger, with sand or dust on the charger place and brook I pay for a fast shipping and I resived on a lot of days.I want my money back.

Reviews.Title: Misleading Sell
Reviews.Author: Dana Harris
Reviews.Content: The software for iPhone is no longer supported I can't do anything with this. The speaker volume is lower than the headset volume

Reviews.Title: Was not what was advertised
Reviews.Author: Ricky Sanderson
Reviews.Content: This was not the apple iPhone 3G, it was in fact a baseline iPhone and I only found out when I took it to AT&T.;

Reviews.Title: Not what I expected
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I gave this rating because this product is an old model.What I like about it is that it is as was stated in the review.  I was like new with only one minor scratch. It works fine.  what I do not like about it is that it cannot be updated and it does not have an external memory card to put in music that you want to.  I am unable to download any apps on it because it does not have the updated capacity to hold them.  I would not recommend it to anyone who wants to down apps and videos of choice.

Reviews.Title: terribly slow and horrible, dont buy it! spend the extra and get at least iphone 4
Reviews.Author: 0_0Donuts
Reviews.Content: terribly slow and horrible, dont buy it! spend the extra and get at least iphone 4terribly slow and horrible, dont buy it! spend the extra and get at least iphone 4terribly slow and horrible, dont buy it! spend the extra and get at least iphone 4

Reviews.Title: Very Pleased!
Reviews.Author: Paul
Reviews.Content: Paid $50 for a Good Condition 16G IPhone 3GS. Came with a functional case. Had a crack in the phone as described. When attempting to put a SIM card in, the phone had no reception. Started the return process before realizing that it worked great for Apps with wi-fi, music, games, etc. What was I thinking?!  After enjoying flawless functions for awhile, I tried the SIM card again and it worked. Something is wrong with it somewhere but for the price I couldn't be happier with the product.

Reviews.Title: it's okay
Reviews.Author: Richard Steckel
Reviews.Content: I can't download most of the apps because the phone's software is too old, but the phone works fine, just slow.

Reviews.Title: New in box as described!
Reviews.Author: R. Harris "Marlie's Mom"
Reviews.Content: This was an amazing find, as I wanted a new-ish iPhone for my daughter to use as an iPod touch. She is thrilled with it and she can download apps she couldn't with her 3rd generation iPod.

Reviews.Title: PRODUCTO DESCONTINUADO
Reviews.Author: ALEXANDER MELIAN
Reviews.Content: EL IPHONE ESTA EN BUEN ESTADO DESACTUALIZADO A LA VERSION EN OPTIMAS CONDICIONES OFERTA MEJORABLE EN LA TIENDA EN LINEA Y CONTRAPARTE

Reviews.Title: Phone was ok
Reviews.Author: Kapulani Santos
Reviews.Content: The only thing that turned me off was that the phone was dirty and it came with an UGLY case which was hard to remove!

Reviews.Title: Apple iPhone 3G 16GB (Black)
Reviews.Author: Jehangir  F. Shroff
Reviews.Content: The phone was not unlocked and the charger was defective as it was not the original charger that came with the phone. Also the Sim replacement PIN was missing. Did not expect an item from Amazon with this type of issues. Thanks

Reviews.Title: DISAPPOINTED
Reviews.Author: Sandy
Reviews.Content: Product did not work properly and was pretty scratched up.  Product had no sound and parts were missing from the product.

Reviews.Title: so can this phone be used for a t and t
Reviews.Author: ryry12
Reviews.Content: can this phone be used for at and t i mean is that the company it is locked to i am about to arder it and would like to know please help

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Bert "Bert"
Reviews.Content: Im watching my son use this right now to txt his girlfriend. It's slower without a sim in it he said, but hooks up easily to monthly no contract AT&T.;  Great deal and he's had it since April 2012. It came new, sealed and with everything you'd get brand new at a big box store.

Reviews.Title: It works
Reviews.Author: Angel
Reviews.Content: There is nothing wrong with the phone except it runs super super slow. Wish I could have bought the higher model instead. I recommend getting the 3gs and not 3g.

Reviews.Title: Check the Carrier
Reviews.Author: ana244
Reviews.Content: The phone was fine.  My only problem was not researching if the phone was compatible to my cell phone carrier.  Always check before purchasing.

Reviews.Title: no
Reviews.Author: ec
Reviews.Content: Crapped out on me after 12 hours. Now I remember why I hate iPhones. Being sent bac tomorrow and I've gone back to my Blackberry.

Reviews.Title: Just great
Reviews.Author: MzTaria
Reviews.Content: Just great! Wasn't paying attention to which phone I was purchasing. This phone I bought for my 13 yr old son. What a waist, can't post pictures otherwise 3-4 stars

Reviews.Title: Willl not hold a charge
Reviews.Author: Paulina Flores
Reviews.Content: This arrived a few days later than expected.  Then I plugged in the charger provided to my computer as instructed.  The phone turned on for a while and showed that it was charging, then went dark (with the red low-battery signal).  Now it will not charge at all.  The instructions say to charge for one hour, then reset, but it would not even get that far. Now I have to pay money to take it to a repair shop as the seller will not respond and the purchase was made with "NO RETURNS".  No matter what, it is always best to buy with Amazon Fullfillment, anything else is a risk.

Reviews.Title: bad chose
Reviews.Author: armanda
Reviews.Content: i brought this iphone3g cople weeks ago but i made some bad mistake because it was say it was jell breack but it not already spend 50$00 to unblocked now i dont't know if i trust on buys electronic online anymore

Reviews.Title: Buyer Beware!!!!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: Skogkatt
Reviews.Content: BE FOREWARNED!!!! You will have a hard time upgrading to iOS4. The phone may permanently lock, and be un-useable. I am using this phone on T-Mobile, and the preformance is sluggish. Spend the extra money on an un-locked 3GS, or an iPhone 4. Total waste of money.

Reviews.Title: phone
Reviews.Author: goody
Reviews.Content: Can't say much cause I still haven't received it yet. I like android better but I've been having to many problems with them lately , so I'm gonna try the apple phone again.
